title: List Open HTLC Lock transactions
description: The paginated API is used to query for multiple HTLC Locs transactions. You can apply _filters_ through the query parameter to search for specific transactions.

page.description: The number of the page that will be returned.

limit.description: The number of resources per page.

offset.description: The number of resources to be skipped.

orderBy.description: The column by which the resources will be sorted.

lockId.description: The lock id of transaction to be retrieved.

senderPublicKey.description: The sender public key of transaction to be retrieved.

recipientId.description: The recipient address of transaction to be retrieved.

isExpired.description: The expired status of transaction to be retrieved.

expirationType.description: The expiration type of transaction to be retrieved.

expirationValue.description: The expiration value of transaction to be retrieved.

expirationValue.from.description: The minimum expiration value of transaction to be retrieved.

expirationValue.to.description: The maximum expiration value of transaction to be retrieved.

secretHash.description: The secret hash of transaction to be retrieved.

amount.description: The amount of transaction to be retrieved.

amount.from.description: The minimum amount of transaction to be retrieved.

amount.to.description: The maximum amount of transaction to be retrieved.

timestamp.epoch.description: The epoch timestamp of the transaction to be retrieved.

timestamp.epoch.from.description: The minimum epoch timestamp of the transaction to be retrieved.

timestamp.epoch.to.description: The maximum epoch timestamp of the transaction to be retrieved.

timestamp.unix.description: The unix timestamp of the transaction to be retrieved.

timestamp.unix.from.description: The minimum unix timestamp of the transaction to be retrieved.

timestamp.unix.to.description: The maximum unix timestamp of the transaction to be retrieved.

timestamp.human.description: The human timestamp of the transaction to be retrieved.

vendorField.description: The vendorField of transaction to be retrieved.
